title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not render the expected formatting for different types of content in a database field.
EB: The dynamic text element should render HTML text within <html>...</html> tags as rendered HTML, HTML fragments not within <html> tags as plain text, and text with RTF tags as formatted text.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Have a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not render the content as expected for each type.
